abstract: Travelers in 26 airports can visit kiosks done up like Santa Claus workshops beginning Dec. 2, and have their photos taken as part of a holiday promotion between Southwest Airlines and Microsoft.
snippet: Travelers in 26 airports can visit kiosks done up like Santa Claus workshops beginning Dec. 2, and have their photos taken as part of a holiday promotion between Southwest Airlines and Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: In another example of its efforts to behave more like a consumer marketer, Microsoft is teaming up with Southwest Airlines for a holiday promotion that will take place in 26 airports around the country as well as online.

headline.main: With Southwest, Microsoft Takes Photos on the Fly
